articles.title: Mammoth Pyongyang Rally Denounces UNSC "Resolution"
articles.content:
Mammoth Pyongyang Rally Denounces UNSC "Resolution"
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city rally was held at Kim Il Sung Square Monday to denounce the United Nations Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" cooked up at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists.
					Attending the rally were senior party, army and state officials, the chairman of a friendly party, leading officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, youth and students and people from all walks of life, more than 100,000 in all.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in a speech said that the UNSC finally adopted an anti-DPRK "resolution on sanctions" at the instigation of the U.S. over the DPRK's second nuclear test, another grave provocation. This is, in essence, a wicked pressure offensive launched by the U.S. imperialists to disarm the DPRK, strangle its economy and undermine its ideology and system, he held, adding:
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" is an intolerable mockery of the dignity of the Korean people and an arrogant criminal act of wantonly violating its sovereignty. 
					
					 The DPRK has so far done what it should do despite the ceaseless "sanctions" on the part of the imperialist allied forces. These "sanctions" prompted it to augment its national power, far from "weakening" it. This clearly proves that no enemy's anti-DPRK "sanctions" racket is workable and it is ridiculous and foolish for the U.S. to try to bring down the DPRK through "sanctions."
					
					 The hostile forces will sustain a bitterer setback and defeat if they persist in the moves for putting sanctions upon the DPRK and stifling it, misjudging the tough stand taken by the army and the people of the DPRK as "brinkmanship."
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces may work to isolate and blockade the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state, it will remain unfazed. In case the enemies foolishly attempt to blockade the DPRK it will respond to it with resolute and deadly blows, considering it as a war action.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily advance along the path of independence chosen by itself and will win a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. whether it has flanks or not and whether it receives international aid or not.
					
					 Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces who spoke on behalf of the Korean People's Army, vehemently denounced the UNSC "resolution" as a serious provocation, a wanton violation of the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and its people.
					
					 He warned that the KPA will mercilessly frustrate any attempt to check, inspect, examine and blockade any ship and object for which the sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised with powerful military retaliatory blows.
					
					 Under the present situation where the KPA is technically at war with the U.S. imperialists as the Armistice Agreement has lost its legal binding force the KPA will promptly exercise the right to preemptive strike to beat back the enemies' slightest provocation. It will deal telling blows at the vital parts of the U.S. and wipe out all its imperialist aggressor troops no matter where they are in the world.
					
					 The Japanese militarists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and other lackeys of the U.S. imperialists should stop running wild, well aware that they will never be able to escape a stern punishment by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK if they keep going reckless.
					
					 Then the floor was taken by representatives of workers, agricultural workers, intellectuals and youth and students.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed Here
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the Central Youth Hall on June 15 to observe the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, made a report.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The historic Pyongyang summit and the June 15 joint declaration were the brilliant fruition of the outstanding Songun politics and the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il who worked hard to accomplish the cause of national reunification without fail true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung who made every effort to achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					 The publication of the declaration made it possible for the movement of the Korean nation for reunification to advance straightly along the orbit of independence with a clear-cut goal and principles both in name and reality and rapidly develop into a nation-wide struggle involving all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 After providing the historic June 15 joint declaration and bringing about a landmark phase of national reunification Kim Jong Il wisely led the struggle for implementing the joint declaration, and thus performed great exploits to always shine in the country's history.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need for all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to give further momentum to the struggle for preserving and implementing the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 Neither dialogue nor contact would be thinkable nor improved north-south relations could be expected without the implementation of the inter-Korean joint declarations, the reporter noted, stressing the need for the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas to firmly unite as one under the banner of patriotism for reunification and open up new avenue for independent reunification. 
					
					 The reporter called upon all the fellow countrymen to turn out in the struggle to shatter the war moves of the Lee Myung Bak group serving as shock brigade in the moves for "sanctions" against the DPRK following the U.S. policy for stifling it regardless of the destiny of the nation and to defend peace and security of the Korean Peninsula after withdrawing the U.S. troops from south Korea.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Open Decisive Phase for National Reunification
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Open Decisive Phase for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement on Monday, nine years after its publication.
					 Referring to the fact that the joint declaration adopted in the historic north-south summit meeting on June 15, 2000, is a milestone of national reunification, the statement said that it serves as an immortal banner as it dynamically arouses all the Koreans to the efforts for carving out the destiny of the nation and realizing the cause of reunification.
					
					 Thanks to the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration the inter-Korean relations characterized by distrust and confrontation, which had persisted for more than half a century, have turned into those of reconciliation, unity and cooperation and a new era of "By our nation itself" and a fresh history of independent reunification were ushered in this land, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 Great progress has been made in the movement for national reunification and in the inter-Korean relations amid the warm enthusiasm of the whole nation for reunification and the meeting of the top leaders of the north and the south was provided again in October 2007, in particular, which adopted the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, opening a new prospect for reunification. 
					
					 The dynamic advance of the independent reunification movement under the banner of "By our nation itself" faced a serious obstacle after the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea.
					
					 The grave circumstance prevailing in the Korean Peninsula clearly shows once again that peace and reunification of the country can be attained only when a do-or-die struggle is conducted against the confrontation and war moves of the anti-reunification forces, internal and external.
					
					 The statement warmly called upon all the Koreans at home and abroad to thoroughly preserve and implement the historic inter-Korean declarations, united close as one under the banner of "By our nation itself," and thus open a decisive phase for the country's reunification.

articles.title: Immortal Feats in Opening up June 15 Era of Reunification
articles.content:
Immortal Feats in Opening up June 15 Era of Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- June 15 is a significant day when a historical turn was made in the efforts for accomplishing the reunification cause of the Korean nation.
					It is none other than General Secretary Kim Jong Il who opened up the June 15 independent reunification era in the efforts for achieving the unity and reunification with the concerted efforts of the Korean nation against the foreign forces.
					
					 The relations between the north and the south were faced with the pitch of confrontation and a grave obstacle was laid on the way of national reunification owing to the moves to stifle the DPRK the imperialists and traitors to the nation had intensified than ever before with the demise of President Kim Il Sung as an occasion in the 1990s.
					
					 It was at that time that true to the lofty intention of the President,  Kim Jong Il declared his strong will to hand over the reunified country to the rising generation without fail and led the Korean people's national reunification movement wisely.
					
					 He published his famous work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" on August 4, Juche 86 (1997). In the work, he re-clarified the will of the Workers' Party of Korea to carry forward the cause of national reunification pioneered and led by the President and realize the country's reunification and advanced  all the principles and tasks for the solution of the reunification issue.
					
					 On April 18, 1998 he also published the historic work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation", to arouse all the Koreans in the north, south and overseas to the campaign for achieving the country's reunification with the internal force of the nation.
					
					 Thanks to his unusual leadership, prominent political ability, great courageous determination and magnanimity of loving the country and the nation, the Pyongyang summit was arranged on June 15, 2000, the first of its kind in the history of national division, and the north-south joint declaration was issued to set up the idea of "By our nation itself" as a milestone for the independent reunification.
					
					 As a result, a breakthrough was made in the barrier of having divided the territory into two for more than half a century, railway lines and roads were re-linked and air and sea routes were opened. This brought the atmosphere of national reconciliation and cooperation to upsurge and pro-reunification festivals of the nation were held alternately in Pyongyang and Seoul one after another, opening up the June 15 reunification era.
					
					 The meeting of the leaders of the north and the south and the summit meeting were made in October 2007 to make public the October 4 declaration, which marked a new turning point in the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who has raised the cause of national reunification, the supreme desire of the nation, up to the highest stage, the Korean people are certain to build a reunified and prosperous country on this land.

articles.title: Film Show Hosted for Foreign Diplomats
articles.content:
Film Show Hosted for Foreign Diplomats
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A film show for officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of different embassies here was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Monday on the occasion of the 9th publication anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present there were Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and vice-chairman of the DPRK Committee for Solidarity with the World People, and officials concerned.
					
					 The participants watched "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Meets with President Kim Dae Jung", a Korean documentary film on which the significant scenes showing the historic inter-Korean Pyongyang summit and the adoption of the north-south joint declaration are recorded.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to Iranian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to Iranian President
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a congratulatory message to Mahmoud Ahmadinejad upon his reelection as president of Iran.
					 Kim in the message said that his reelection as Iranian president is the expression of support and trust of the Iranian people in him and sincerely wished him success in his responsible work to frustrate pressure and interference of outsiders and build independent and prosperous Iran.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries that were forged in the joint struggle for independence against imperialism would favorably grow stronger in all fields.

articles.title: Chinese Delegations
articles.content:
Chinese Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Oceanic Administration of China headed by Deputy Administrator Chen Lianzeng came here today.
					 Arriving also was a delegation of the "Kim Il Sung Class" of Beijing  Middle School No.5 in China led by Principal Shang Jinhua.

articles.title: Russian Dance Company Gives Performance
articles.content:
Russian Dance Company Gives Performance
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the Russian State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Sunday on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among the audience were senior officials of the DPRK, officials of armed forces organs, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions and officials in the fields of literature and arts and media and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The Russian ambassador to the DPRK and staff members of the Russian embassy were also among the audience.
					
					 The performers staged Russian dance "Summer," Greek dance suite "Sirtaki," Argentinean cowboy dance "Gaucho" and other numbers representing the national emotion and customs of peoples of Russia and other countries with high artistry and enthusiastic rhythms. 
					
					 They also successfully presented Korean folk dance "Trio Dance." 
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 A floral basket was presented to the artistes. 
					
					 The senior officials mounted the stage to congratulate them on their successful presentation.

articles.title: Great Paekryong Cavern, Natural Monument
articles.content:
Great Paekryong Cavern, Natural Monument
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- There is the Great Paekryong Cavern in Kujang County, North Phyongan Province of Korea.
					 The natural cavern is marvelous and beautiful for its natural formative beauties of myriads which consist of different sizes and shapes of stalactites, stalagmites, stone flowers, waterfalls, ponds, rocks, stones and others formed through the dissolution and corrosion of the limestone layer by rainwater and underground water for a long time.
					
					 The Great Paekryong Cavern has the main cavern and various side ones including Miro and Sanhae caverns.
					
					 In the main cavern, there are a place called "Mammosudong" with a large stalagmite like a mammoth in the glacial period, a high waterfall, cold spring water and a broad and plane sand place called "Myongsasipri".
					
					 Besides, there are many scenic spots called "Phokphodong", "Phododong" and other names for the different shapes of stalactites and stalagmites.
					
					 The pond in Sanhae cavern is located on the highest place of the Great Paekryong Cavern, the water of which is always cold and clear.
					
					 The Great Paekryong Cavern, a natural monument, is significant in geological study.

articles.title: Reason Why He Left Stick in Car
articles.content:
Reason Why He Left Stick in Car
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his eighties made round of fields on a Sunday in the middle of June, Juche 83 (1994), the last days of his life.
					He visited a cooperative farm that day when a strong wind came from the West Sea, raising dust on the field path.
					
					After saluting the President, an official courteously said that he should refrain from walking along the rugged path across fields in the windy weather.
					
					The President said that it didn't matter and he could walk any rugged path for the wellbeing of the people.
					
					Stepping towards fields, he acquainted himself with the estimated maize production per hectare and expressed satisfaction over the fact that the farm raised good crops. He stated that other farms, too, should do farming like this and should produce large amounts of humus to raise good crops for the year. And then he acquainted himself with dry field irrigation.
					
					Time glided along and the sun began to sink in the west. The wind became still stronger.
					
					The officials accompanying him told the President repeatedly that he should turn back as the wind blew hard. But he continued to walk along the field path, noting that only by being exposed to such wind longer could they bring about a rich harvest.
					
					Going round the fields for a long time, he left the farm, leaving the words that he would re-visit it.
					
					But nobody knew that it was the field path along which he walked in the last moments of his life.
					
					After his demise, the people came to know that that day he walked along the field path with his stick left in the car lest the people should worry themselves about him.
					
					Being told about the story, people wailed, walking again and again the field path marked by the footsteps of the President in the last moments of his great life.

articles.title: KCNA Snubs U.S. Much Publicized Story about "Counterfeiting"
articles.content:
KCNA Snubs U.S. Much Publicized Story about "Counterfeiting"
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is again floating the fiction of the DPRK's "counterfeiting money."
					 The mandarins of the U.S. administration are now taking much pain to make their misinformation sound plausible, while having confabs with its followers to exchange information and get explanations about it.
					
					 This is nothing but a foolish and ridiculous attempt to damage the image of the DPRK and realize their sinister plot through increased sanctions and pressure.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which is to blame for counterfeiting. 
					
					 It is nobody's secret that false banknotes are mass-produced at the back rooms of the CIA and in cesspools of crimes in different parts of the U.S. including California. The U.S. tops the world's list of counterfeiting money. 
					
					 The "evidence" of the DPRK's "counterfeiting money" produced by the U.S. is too poor and hypocritical to convince anyone.
					
					 The June 8th issue of News Week quoted a former U.S. diplomat as saying the U.S. could not find even a shred of evidence proving north Korea's counterfeiting of money during the Bush administration. This gives the lie to the story floated by the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. administration hastily picked up again the fiction of "counterfeiting money," much upset by the DPRK's successful launch of a satellite for peaceful purposes and the toughest measures taken by it against the U.S. arrogant hostile acts. This is a shameless hypocritical campaign to insult the DPRK and pressurize it to yield to the U.S. under the world's eyes.
					
					 It was clearly stated by the June 4th issue of the Washington Times that the "issue of counterfeiting money" raised by the present U.S. administration is a playing card for pressuring the DPRK.
					
					 This proves that the issue is a matter concerning the U.S. and has nothing to do with the DPRK.
					
					 As proven by the truth behind the wide-spread story of "Iraq's possession of WMD," the U.S. is apt to make profound confusion of right and wrong in a bid to realize its sinister plot to bring down a sovereign state.
					
					 The U.S. is so deeply steeped in repugnancy toward the DPRK's ideology and system to the marrow of its bones that when the DPRK denies any access to nukes, it claims the DPRK has nuclear weapons and when the DPRK says that it has ones, the U.S. insists it will not recognize the fact. It even misinterpreted the DPRK's satellite launch as a missile launch although it was well aware that it was a satellite.
					
					 The U.S. lacks any logic or coherence in its claims as it is keen to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The diplomacy conducted by the U.S. on the basis of the worn-out fiction of "counterfeiting money" was prompted by the frustration of its anti-DPRK hostile policy.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are hardly repressing their towering indignation at the present U.S. administration as the hostile policy desperately pursued by it toward the DPRK provided another irrefutable evidence that it is little different from the preceding administration.
					
					 The U.S. administration would be well advised to draw a lesson from its preceding administration which imposed sanctions upon the DPRK under the pretext of "counterfeiting" only to suffer a bitter setback.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Foolish Nuclear War Gambling Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Foolish Nuclear War Gambling Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's recent decision to have the U.S. provision of a "nuclear umbrella" stipulated in an official document is, in fact, a thrice-cursed criminal act to introduce more U.S. nukes into south Korea in a bid to turn it into a bigger nuclear arsenal and reduce the land of Korea to nuclear war shambles of the U.S., says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary.
					 South Korea's above-said decision is little short of making the provocation of a nuclear war an established fact, the commentary points out, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group openly advocated the theory of "nuclear weaponization", talking about "nuclear sovereignty" and "access to nuclear weapons". It is the long-cherished wild ambition of the south Korean puppets to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors is, indeed, one of very dangerous warmongers who would not rule out even a nuclear war to exterminate its fellow countrymen.
					
					 The group is gravely mistaken if it thinks it can go scot-free after launching the nuclear war gambling against the DPRK. The nuclear deterrent of the DPRK is a means for defending the country but it will never show mercy to those who provoke a nuclear war. The DPRK has means and capability strong enough to beat back the provocateurs at a single stroke and defend the country and socialism. The puppets' nuclear gambling is a foolish self-suicidal act.
					
					 Should the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers launch a reckless adventure at last defying the DPRK's warnings, its revolutionary armed forces will resolutely and mercilessly retaliate against the nuclear war maniacs, reducing them to ashes.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Agitating Reinvasion of Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Accused of Agitating Reinvasion of Korea
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The chief of staff of the Air "Self-Defence Force" of Japan on June 5 blustered that Japan is getting "prepared for intercepting missiles," raising a hue and cry over the "missile threat" from the DPRK. He said that the "Self-Defence Forces (SDF)" "continues gathering information about the moves of the DPRK to launch missiles" and it is capable of winding up the deployment of a missile shield in 3 hours, once an order is given by the minister of Defence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard;
					
					 His utterances are a revelation of Japan's anti-DPRK hysteria which has gone into extremes since the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and second nuclear test and agitation of reinvasion of Korea.     It is the height of folly for the Japanese reactionaries to vociferate about the "threat of missiles" from the DPRK, making a ridiculous speculation that someone would reduce the Japanese archipelago to a sea of fire right now. 
					
					 Their loud-mouthed "threat of missiles" from the DPRK is nothing but sheer sophism intended to justify and push forward their ambitious building of missile shields and secure a pretext for launching a military invasion against the DPRK.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that "preparations for intercepting missiles" to cope with the "threat of missiles" from the DPRK are timed to coincide with the noisy outbursts calling for "the preemptive attack on the enemy bases" heard from among the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 Their much touted "preemptive attack on enemy bases" is nothing but a declaration of a war and invasion as they had the DPRK in mind when letting loose such outbursts. 
					
					 Having emerged a dangerous war state and aggressor force, Japan reached an extreme phase in its moves to stage a comeback to Korea.
					
					 By kicking off its invasion of the DPRK the Japanese reactionaries seek to embark upon the road of aggression overseas and realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" it failed to do so in the past.
					
					Japan is, however, miscalculating.
					
					 If Japan persistently perpetrates an attack on the DPRK over the latter's fictitious "threat", its armed forces will deal merciless and deadly retaliatory blows at Japan.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Lauded as Programme for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Lauded as Programme for Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The historic June 15 joint declaration is the reunification programme common to the Korean nation and the banner of great victory as it showed a shortcut to realizing the desire and wish of the entire nation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Embodied in the joint declaration is the unanimous desire of all Koreans for national independence, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The joint declaration calls upon the Korean nation in the north and the south to join efforts and independently settle the problem of national reunification by itself as the very one responsible for this problem. The presentation of the idea "By our nation itself" made clear the path of independent reunification in the new century.
					
					 Carried in the declaration is the demand of all Koreans for peace and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The declaration indicates the ways for preventing military conflicts between the north and the south and realizing the national reunification peacefully, thus powerfully encouraging the Koreans to the struggle for durable peace of the Korean Peninsula and its peaceful reunification.
					
					 Reflected in the declaration is all Koreans' will to improve the north-south relations and make a new turning point of unified development of the country and prosperity of the nation through reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" advanced in the joint declaration mirrors the fundamental principles for improvement of the north-south relations and national reunification.
					
					 Signal achievements have been made one after another in the development of the inter-Korean relations since the publication of the joint declaration. This is a clear proof of the vitality of "By our nation itself", the most just and patriotic idea for reunification.
					
					 By clarifying that the north and the south will develop the national economy in a balanced way and activate cooperation and exchange, the joint declaration opened up a broad avenue for intensifying reconciliation and cooperation based on the idea "By our nation itself".
					
					 The joint declaration serves as a milestone for the independent reunification of the nation and a great programme of national reunification.
					
					 Independent reunification, peace and prosperity depend on defending and implementing the inter-Korean declarations, the article concludes.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Two Secondary Schoolgirls Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Two Secondary Schoolgirls Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Solidarity for Progress in Northern Kyonggi Province of south Korea held a memorial service in Kyonggi Province on June 12 seven years since the secondary schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son were brutally killed by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					 Speakers at the memorial service noted that the U.S. imperialist homicides perpetrated an atrocity of driving an armored vehicle over the two secondary schoolgirls on a road on June 13, 2002, brutally killing them.
					
					 Nevertheless the U.S. forces' criminals were not punished and, instead, the U.S. forces are going so bronze-faced enough as to make a mockery of the two slain schoolgirls and the people in south Korea, they held.
					
					 As long as the U.S. troops remain in south Korea, no one can know when another similar case will happen, they deplored.
					
					 They said that they would erect a memorial tower at the place where the two schoolgirls were killed to indict the U.S. forces for their criminal atrocity.

articles.title: DPRK's Cause of Independent and Peaceful Reunification Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Cause of Independent and Peaceful Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea made public a statement on June 10 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Recalling that the joint declaration which calls for giving momentum to the process of north-south reconciliation and reunification in the interests of all Koreans was adopted in Pyongyang on June 15, 2000, the statement said:
					
					 The DPRK is invariably pursuing its policy for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 No sooner had the present south Korean authorities seized power than they became undisguised in their policy of confrontation with the DPRK, pursuant to the policies of outside forces including the U.S. and Japan. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once their acts of totally denying the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The U.S. should stop interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK and immediately withdraw its armed forces for aggression from south Korea and its vicinity as they pose constant threat to it. 
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK at once, replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace agreement and implement DPRK-U.S. agreements.
					
					 The statement called attention to the fact that Western media are disregarding the basic interests of the whole Korean nation, while keeping mum about such important issues as the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and releasing misinformation about the situation on the Korean Peninsula instead of contributing to Korea's reunification and its peace.

articles.title: Month of Int'l Solidarity with Korean People Opens in Cuba
articles.content:
Month of Int'l Solidarity with Korean People Opens in Cuba
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people was held in Cuba on June 10.
					 Present there were personages of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, the Foreign Ministry, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the "Chollima" Dockyard and others.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of the DPRK embassy.
					
					 First Vice-Chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification Juan Jose Leon Vega in his speech recalled that under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the Korean People's Army and people shattered the "myth" of the mightiness of the U.S. imperialists and won brilliant victory in the three-year long Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Though the U.S. imperialists suffered a bitter defeat in the last Korean War, they are frantically stepping up the preparations for a war of aggression against the DPRK after deploying huge armed forces of aggression in south Korea, he said, and went on:
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung, is arousing all the Korean people to the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea as early as possible, frustrating every move of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification strongly denounces the U.S. imperialists for applying double standards over the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula and driving the denuclearization of the peninsula into danger by pursuing a strong arm policy in collusion with some countries.
					
					 The Cuba-DPRK friendship provided and brought into full bloom by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz is as strong as steel, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian and Indonesian political figures made public statements on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Atanas Ivanov, chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, in his statement on June 5 noted that Kim Jong Il clarified the philosophy on army that a revolution starts, advances and emerges victorious thanks to arms and the principle of Songun that an army represents a party, state and people and led the WPK to grow strong as a guiding force winning only victory in the ever-escalating confrontation with imperialism.
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored lots of works clarifying the main principle to be adhered to in the struggle for carving out the destiny of the nation, thereby making it possible for socialist Korea to firmly protect the dignity and sovereignty of the nation under the banner of independence, the statement noted. 
					
					 The Songun politics enforced in all fields of the DPRK is the brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's idea of national independence and it serves as a treasured sword of the nation for frustrating outside forces' aggression and interference and reliably defending the national sovereignty and destiny of fellow countrymen and an undying banner of independent reunification as it provides a sure guarantee for the uniform development of the nation, the statement stressed.
					
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Vanguard Party of Indonesia, in his statement on June 9 said that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK has developed into a guiding force leading the Korean people to victory and glory at present and the DPRK has turned into a political and ideological power and military power.
					
					 The recent successful satellite launch and nuclear test conducted by the Korean people fully demonstrated before the whole world the might of the DPRK under Kim Jong Il's wise guidance and the level of its science and technology, the statement added.

articles.title: Punishment of Murderers' Group Called for
articles.content:
Punishment of Murderers' Group Called for
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine, released a statement titled "The Lee Myung Bak group can never evade the responsibility for Roh Moo Hyun's tragic death" on June 11.
					 The statement referred to the unprecedented tragic incident in south Korea whereby its former "president" Roh Moo Hyun committed suicide shortly ago, denouncing this as politically motivated premeditated and deliberate terrorism by the U.S. and the south Korean pro-U.S. conservative forces. 
					
					 It said:
					
					 This incident glaringly revealed under the world eyes that south Korea has turned into the worst tundra of democracy and human rights after the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime came to power.
					
					 The group of traitors can never escape from the responsibility for having driven Roh Moo Hyun into death and with nothing can it quell the explosion of the people's resentment.
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine will positively turn out in the struggle to sternly judge the group of murderers with the resentment against the group of traitors.

articles.title: Campaigns for Denouncing Lee Myung Bak Launched in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Campaigns for Denouncing Lee Myung Bak Launched in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Campaigns for declarations on the situation were launched in foreign countries, too, to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of the June Popular Resistance in south Korea.
					 239 south Korean and foreign professors of such universities as Hawaii University, Florida University, Johns Hopkins University, Harvard University, University of Columbia and University of Indiana in the U.S. and Canada issued declarations on the situation on June 9.
					
					 Noting with concern about the fact that democracy has been violated in south Korea, they, in the declarations, deplored the present situation in which everything goes against the trend of the times under the Lee Myung Bak "government." 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime should make deep-going repentance of itself and opt for providing the south Korean people with genuine right and realizing the democracy of the society, they asserted.
					
					 At least 300 philosophers of Germany, France and other countries also issued similar declarations on June 11 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its crude violation of democracy.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Observed
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a lecture took place in Egypt and Democratic Congo and a meeting, book exhibition and film show in India from June 4 to 7 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display in the venues of the events were Kim Jong Il's works, photos showing his Songun leadership exploits and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, at a seminar on the work of Kim Jong Il "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" noted that in the work he comprehensively clarified the need to give priority to the ideological work and its essence, main tasks and contents, principles and ways and other issues and proved the truth of history that socialism is sure to triumph if it holds fast to ideology and socialism is bound to go ruin if ideology is neglected under it. 
					
					 Kanga Ngerien Jerom, chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, in his lecture said that the nearly half a century long-history of Kim Jong Il's leadership over the WPK is a period that showed the personality of a genuine popular statesman.
					
					 The participants of the film show watched DPRK CD "Extravaganza 'Arirang'."

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of Inter-Korean Joint Declaration Observed in Colombia and Peru
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of Inter-Korean Joint Declaration Observed in Colombia and Peru
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Colombia-Korea Association of Friendship and Culture released a bulletin on June 8 on the occasions of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The bulletin in an article said that an inter-Korean summit was held and the joint declaration was adopted in Pyongyang for the first time in the history of the split of the Korean nation, adding that this was a noteworthy event that brought about a landmark turn in the movement for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration is the cornerstone for developing the inter-Korean relations and a great programme for the reunification of Korea as it clarified the ideological basis, main principles and ways for achieving national reconciliation, unity and reunification, it pointed out. 
					
					 The bulletin referred in detail to the facts that great progress was made in the movement of the Korean people for the reunification of the country after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the movement for the reunification of Korea faced a grave challenge from the outset of 2008 due to the seizure of power by the south Korean conservative forces though it had made dynamic progress in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 Noting that the June 15 joint declaration serves as an invariable banner for the reunification of Korea, the bulletin said that the international community hoped that the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea would be sure to be achieved under the banner of the declaration.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism on May 27 released its bulletin. It carried articles supporting the just stand of the DPRK over the nuclear issue and disclosing the injustice of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la opera "El sueno en la camara roja"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la opera "El sueno en la camara roja"
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la opera "El sueno en la camara roja" en el Gran Teatro de Hamhung.
					El Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre, al desarrollar energicamente la labor para recrear la opera "El sueno en la camara roja" conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo en el presente, "Ano de la amistad Corea-China", completo excelentemente todos los elementos de la descripcion en alto nivel artistico.
					
					  Luego de verla, el Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que los creadores y artistas presentaron la excelente opera que refleja con fidelidad la demanda de la obra original dedicando toda su inteligencia y entusiasmo, evaluo altamente los exitos de la funcion de ellos y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					  Dijo que el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre, que comenzo la creacion de la  opera revolucionaria al estilo de Mar de Sangre, volvio a demostrar patentemente la capacidad de la competente y prestigiosa entidad artistica mediante el proceso de la creacion de la opera "El sueno en la camara roja" como colectivo artistico que lleva adelante el precioso patrimonio de las 5 Operas Revolucionarias y anadio que esto deviene la fehaciente prueba de la justedad e inagotable vitalidad de la original idea literario-artistica del PTC y la gran potencialidad de nuestro colectivo de creacion artistica.
					
					  En particular, es una cosa  digna de enorgullecernos de que los incipientes actores, quienes estan en el estudio o fueron recientemente graduados de la universidad, cumplieron bien la descripcion de los protagonistas principales y figurantes de la opera, subrayo y enfatizo que esto muestra fehacientemente que es verdaderamente justa la orientacion de nuestro Partido en materia de formacion de las artistas de reservas y que se continua con firmeza la generacion del arte del Juche.
					
					  Agrego que los exitos logrados por el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre comprueban que cuando la vision innovadora del siglo XXI se combina con el modo de creacion y el estilo de lucha creados en la decada de 1970, es posible producir el extraordinario auge creativo y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en desarrollar incesantemente la literatura y arte de Corea. 
					
					  La vieron tambien el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Choe Il Gyu, Pak Nam Gi y Kim Yang Gon, el secretario del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kim Yong Gyu, y otros cuadros directivos, los generales de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y los miembros de mando del ejercito, funcionarios de los dominios de literatura, arte, prensa e informacion, creadores y artistas.

articles.title: Acto central por 9o aniversario de la Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
articles.content:
Acto central por 9o aniversario de la Declaracion Conjunta de 15 de Junio
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 9o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Ki Nam,  Yang Hyong Sop, los presidentes de los partidos amigos, los miembros del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y las Direcciones Nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y de la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria, asi como trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, quien dijo como sigue:
					
					El historico encuentro cumbre de Pyongyang y la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio se deben enteramente a la destacada politica de Songun (priorizacion militar) y a la probada y diestra direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, decidido a cumplir sin falta la causa de reunificacion de la patria en pleno acato al gran proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien habia trabajado incansablemente para ese fin.
					
					Gracias a la Declaracion Conjunta, el movimiento de la nacion coreana por la reunificacion pudo avanzar por la senda de independencia con la meta y principios claros y adquirir rapidamente la dimension pannacional.
					
					El Dirigente, quien abrio la coyuntura trascendental de la reunificacion de la patria al propiciar la historica Declaracion Conjunta, condujo sabiamente la lucha por ejecutar la declaracion en cuestion acumulando asi enormes hazanas imborrables en los anales de la patria.
					
					Todos los coreanos deben dar espuelas a la lucha por defender y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta N-S.
					
					Sin materializar eso documento intercoreano, no habra ningun dialogo ni contacto ni la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben unirse con firmeza como un solo hombre bajo la bandera de la reunificacion y abrir nuevo y ancho camino para la integracion independiente.
					
					Tambien, deben levantarse con vigor como un solo hombre en la lucha por frustrar las maniobras de provocacion de guerra de Lee Myung Bak que se presenta como brigada de ataque del complot de "sancion" aferrandose a la politica de EE.UU. tendente a aplastar a Corea sin considerar el destino de la nacion, retirar a los efectivos yanquis del suelo surcoreano y preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Entidad nortena exhorta a dar la coyuntura decisiva de reunificacion
articles.content:
Entidad nortena exhorta a dar la coyuntura decisiva de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 9o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el portavoz del Comite Norteno para la Ejecucion de la misma publico el dia 15  una declaracion.
					  La declaracion conjunta aprobada el 15 de junio de 2000 en el historico encuentro cumbre Norte-Sur de Corea es la hoja de ruta de la reunificacion de la patria y la inmortal bandera estimulante para levantar dinamicamente a todos los coreanos en la forja del destino nacional y el cumplimiento de esa causa, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					  Gracias a la adopcion de ella, las relaciones N-S de desconfianza y confrontacion, que perduraron mas de medio siglo, se convirtieron en las de reconciliacion, unidad y cooperacion y se dio inicio en el territorio patrio a la nueva epoca de entre los connacionales y a la nueva historia de la reunificacion independiente.
					
					  En medio del calido entusiasmo de todos los coreanos por reunificar el pais, se logro gran avance en el movimiento para este fin y en las relaciones N-S y, sobre todo, en octubre de 2007 se celebro otra vez la cumbre intercoreana. Al aprobarse en esta ocasion la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa para la implementacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, se abrio un nuevo horizonte para la reunificacion.
					
					  El movimiento por la reunificacion independiente, que avanzaba con vigor bajo la bandera "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", tropezo con serios obstaculos debido a la aparicion del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  La grave situacion creada hoy en la Peninsula Coreana demuestra claramente que la paz y la reunificacion del pais las pueden conquistar solo cuando libren la resistencia a costa de la vida contra las maniobras de confrontacion y guerra de las fuerzas internas y externas oponentes a la reunificacion.
					
					  Exhortamos ardientemente a todos los coreanos en el interior y el exterior del pais a hacer que unidos firmemente bajo la bandera "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", defiendan e implementen exhaustivamente las historicas declaraciones N-S y den la coyuntura decisiva para la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: ATCC revela el caracter enganoso del rumor de "billetes falsificados"
articles.content:
ATCC revela el caracter enganoso del rumor de "billetes falsificados"
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos vuelve a circular el supuesto rumor de "billetes falsificados" por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  En los ultimos dias, los altos funcionarios de la administracion norteamericana se esfuerzan mucho por dar cierta credulidad a ese rumor intercambiando con sus satelites las informaciones y brindando explicaciones al respecto.
					
					  Esto no pasa de ser un ridiculo intento de mellar la imagen de la RPDC y alcanzar su meta hostil a ella mediante el recrudecimiento de la sancion y presion.
					
					  El protagonista de esa actividad ilicita es precisamente EE.UU.
					
					  Ya no es un secreto que en las oficinas traseras de la CIA y los antros de criminales en todas partes de EE.UU., incluyendo el estado de California, se producen en gran cantidad esos billetes.
					
					 Por esta razon, la Norteamerica es considerada como cuartel general de la falsificacion de billetes.
					
					  De otro lado, son pueriles y carentes de credulidad todas las "pruebas" presentadas por EE.UU. para vincular a nuestro pais con ese tema.
					
					 Citando las palabras de un ex diplomatico norteamericano, la revista "News Week" escribio el 8 de junio que durante el mandato de la administracion Bush, EE.UU. "no pudo encontrar ni una pizca de la prueba convincente sobre la falsificacion de billetes por el Norte de Corea".
					
					 Estas lineas son una muestra directa de las circunstancias del suceso.
					
					  Tan pronto como la RPDC lanzo exitosamente el satelite artificial con fines pacificos y adopto la posicion de sobredureza a los arrogantes actos hostiles de EE.UU., la administracion norteamericana se apresuro a sacar el polemico rumor en su intento de insultarnos y doblegarnos mediante la presion y enganar cinicamente al mundo.
					
					  "Washington Times" aclaro en su edicion del dia 4 que el "problema de billetes falsificados" presentado por la actual administracion norteamericana es una carta para presionar a Corea.
					
					  Todo esto demuestra que el problema en cuestion es un asunto de EE.UU. que no tiene nada que ver con nuestro pais.
					
					 Como mostro el rumor de la "posesion de armas de exterminio masivo por Irak", cuya falsedad fue reconocida por el mundo, EE.UU. recurre al metodo rutinario de convertir lo blanco en lo negro para realizar su siniestro complot contra otros Estados soberanos.
					
					 EE.UU., habituado a rehusar la idea, el regimen y la causa de nuestro pais, insiste en que tenemos armas nucleares cuando le decimos que no y no quiere reconocer la posesion de los mismos artefactos aunque la confirmamos.
					
					 Ademas, se obstina en que es un misil a sabiendas de que se trata de un satelite artificial lo que acabamos de lanzar.
					
					  Carecen asi de logica y coherencia tales criterios de EE.UU. que esta obsesionado solo por atropellar a nuestro pais.
					
					 Por lo tanto, la recirculacion de ese destenido rumor muestra que el imperio se siente frustrado por su inefectiva politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					 Nuestro pueblo esta muy indignado ahora tomando ese caso como otra irrefutable prueba de que la actual administracion norteamericana es identica a su antecesora en practicar brutalmente la politica hostil a Corea.
					
					  Es aconsejable que la administracion norteamericana tenga presente de las lecciones aprendidas por su antecesora que tuvo que beber el trago amargo a pesar de sus empecinados esfuerzos por imponer sus leyes mediante la "sancion" anti-RPDC.
